Name: Last Stonelord
About the game: Last Stonelord is an Old school Rpg , inspired by games like Ultima online and Warcraft! gameplay and Features Start with nothing and try to survive. Build and defend your village. Craft quality items based on your skills levels. No fixed class , exp or caps lavels, only skills to train!
